description.ko: 비에 젖은 도시의 쇠락과 미래 지향적 디지털 대도시의 고주파 발광이 낭만적으로 충돌하는 순간입니다.
description.en: The romantic collision of rain-slicked urban decay and the high-frequency glow of a futuristic digital metropolis.

prompt: A cinematic vertical low-angle shot of a rainy cyberpunk alley in NEON-V. Towering skyscrapers are adorned with massive 3D holograms in #FF00FF magenta and #00FFFF cyan. Heavy monsoon rain creates vibrant reflections on the #1A0033 indigo asphalt. Flying vehicles leave #FF6B35 orange light trails across the foggy urban canyon. Volumetric lighting, 8k resolution, ray-traced reflections, moody and romantic tech-noir atmosphere.
